    Subinterfaces of StateMachine.BehaviourState in io.github.ai4ci.abm

    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    BehaviourModel
    Called during an update cycle before any changes have been made This means any references to state refers to current state, but any references to history refer to the previous state.

    StateUtils.DoesPCRIfSymptomatic
    Flags a behaviour model as seeking (and performing) a PCR test if the person has been symptomatic for 2 days and is compliant and has not had a test in a set number of days (regardless of test outcome).
